snippet: Serbian police believe they have recovered one of four paintings stolen from a private museum in Zurich in 2008 in what was said to be the largest art theft in Swiss history.
abstract: Serbian police believe they have recovered one of four paintings stolen from a private museum in Zurich in 2008 in what was said to be the largest art theft in Swiss history.

headline.main: Stolen Cézanne Painting Worth $110 Million Found in Serbia
headline.print_headline: $110 Million Cézanne Is Recovered in Serbia
